thread.title: Man Utd transfer news: Lyanco's agent speaks out over Old Trafford move | Metro News
thread.title_full: Man Utd transfer news: Lyanco's agent speaks out over Old Trafford move | Metro News

author: Tom Olver For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Man Utd transfer news: Lyanco's agent speaks out over Old Trafford move | Metro News
text:
Tom Olver for Metro.co.uk Thursday 23 Feb 2017 5:39 pm Lyanco is being linked with a move to Manchester United (Picture: Getty) 
Lyanco’s agent has responded following speculation linking the defender with a transfer move to Manchester United . Keep smiling! Mourinho of all people melts hearts with touching message to Ranieri 
The Brazil Under-20 centre-back has made 24 appearances for Sao Paulo since 2015 but has been heavily linked with the Red Devils in recent weeks. 
Reports suggest United, as well as Juventus and Atletico Madrid, are closely monitoring Lyanco, with the 20-year-old understood to be valued at around £10million. 
On United’s rumoured interest for Lyanco, the youngster’s agent Frederico Moraes told Sport Witness: ‘Yeah, I’ve read it. Jose Mourinho is on the hunt for defensive reinforcements (Picture: Getty) 
‘But there’s nothing from England so far. Nothing official has arrived.’ 
Serie A giants Juventus are believed to be favourites to land Lyanco but Moraes refused to rule out a move to the Premier League for his client.
